00047     PagingLandScapeData2D::PagingLandScapeData2D(PagingLandScapeData2DManager *pageMgr):
00048         mParent(pageMgr),
00049         mHeightData (0),
00050         mIsLoaded (false),
00051         mIsModified (false),
00052         mIsRectModified (false),
00053         mRect (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1)
00054     {
00055     }
00056     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00057     PagingLandScapeData2D::~PagingLandScapeData2D()
00058     {    
00059                 unload ();
00060     }
00061     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00062     void PagingLandScapeData2D::init()
00063     {   
00064        //
00065     } 
00066     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00067     void PagingLandScapeData2D::uninit()
00068     {    
00069         PagingLandScapeData2D::unload ();
00070     }
00071     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00072     bool PagingLandScapeData2D::load(const unsigned int x, const unsigned int z)
00073     {
00074         if (!mIsLoaded)
00075                 {
00076                         mIsModified = false;
00077                         mIsRectModified = false;
00078                         mRect = Image::Box (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
00079 
00080                 mPageX = x; 
00081                 mPageZ = z;
00082                 
00083                 mSize = mParent->getOptions()->PageSize;
00084                 
00085             mShiftX = (mPageX * (mSize - 1)) - mParent->getOptions()->maxUnScaledX;
00086             mShiftZ = (mPageZ * (mSize - 1)) - mParent->getOptions()->maxUnScaledZ;
00087         
00088                 const bool isLoadable = _load (x, z);
00089                 mIsLoaded = true;  
00090             return isLoadable;
00091         }
00092         return true;        
00093     }
00094     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00095     void PagingLandScapeData2D::load()
00096     {   
00097         if (!mIsLoaded)
00098         {
00099                 _load();
00100                 mIsLoaded = true;
00101         }
00102     }    
00103     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00104     void PagingLandScapeData2D::unload()
00105     {
00106         if (mIsLoaded)
00107         {
00108             if (mIsModified && mParent->getOptions()->saveDeformation)
00109                 _save ();
00110             delete[] mHeightData;
00111             mHeightData = 0;
00112                 _unload();
00113                 mIsLoaded = false;
00114             #ifndef _MAPSPLITTER
00115                 resetDeformationRectangle ();
00116             #endif
00117         }
00118     }
00119     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00120     void PagingLandScapeData2D::computePowerof2PlusOneSize()
00121     {
00122             mSize = mParent->getOptions()->PageSize;
00123         const size_t p2size = mSize - 1;
00124 
00125         size_t pagex = mXDimension / p2size;
00126         if (mXDimension - (pagex * p2size) > 1)
00127             pagex++;
00128         mXDimension = pagex * p2size + 1;
00129 
00130         size_t pagez = mZDimension / p2size;
00131         if (mZDimension - (pagez * p2size) > 1)
00132             pagez++;
00133         mZDimension =  pagez * p2size + 1;
00134     }
00135     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00136     bool PagingLandScapeData2D::_checkSize(const size_t s)
00137     {
00138         // ispow2 - 1
00139         const int p = static_cast <unsigned int> (s - 1); 
00140         // ispow2
00141         return ((p & (p - 1)) == 0);
00142     }
00143     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00144     const Real PagingLandScapeData2D::getHeightAbsolute(const Real x, const Real z)
00145     {   
00146         const Vector3 scale = mParent->getOptions()->scale;
00147         
00148         // adjust x and z to be local to page
00149         const int i_x = static_cast<int> (x / scale.x - mShiftX);
00150         const int i_z = static_cast<int> (z / scale.z - mShiftZ);
00151 
00152         // due to Real imprecision on Reals, we have to use boundaries here
00153         // otherwise we'll hit asserts.
00154         const int size =  static_cast<int> (mSize-1);
00155         const unsigned int u_x = static_cast<unsigned int> (std::max(std::min (i_x, size), 0));
00156         const unsigned int u_z = static_cast<unsigned int> (std::max(std::min (i_z, size), 0));
00157         
00158         const size_t arraypos = u_z * mSize + u_x; 
00159         assert (mHeightData && arraypos < mMaxArrayPos);
00160             return mHeightData[arraypos];
00161     }
00162 
00163 #ifndef _MAPSPLITTER
00164     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00165     void PagingLandScapeData2D::resetDeformationRectangle ()
00166     {
00167         mRect.left = 0;
00168         mRect.right = 0;
00169         mRect.top = 0;
00170         mRect.bottom = 0;
00171         mIsRectModified = false;
00172     }
00173     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00174     Image::Box PagingLandScapeData2D::getDeformationRectangle ()
00175     {
00176         return mRect;
00177     }
00178     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00179     void PagingLandScapeData2D::adjustDeformationRectangle(const unsigned int x, const unsigned int z)
00180     {
00181         if (mIsRectModified)
00182         {
00183             if (mRect.left > x)
00184                 mRect.left = x;
00185             if (mRect.right < x)
00186                 mRect.right = x;
00187 
00188             if (mRect.top > z)
00189                 mRect.top = z;
00190             if (mRect.bottom < z)
00191                 mRect.bottom = z;
00192         }
00193         else
00194         {
00195             // first modification :
00196             // deformation rectangle is the point
00197             mRect.left = x;
00198             mRect.right = x;
00199             mRect.top = z;
00200             mRect.bottom = z;
00201             mIsRectModified = true;
00202             mIsModified = true;
00203         }
00204         unsigned int tileposx = x;
00205         unsigned int tileposz = z;
00206             PagingLandScapeTile *t = 
00207             mParent->getSceneManager()->getPageManager()->getTilePage(tileposx, tileposz, 
00208                                                                                 mPageX, mPageZ);
00209             if (t && t->isLoaded ())
00210             { 
00211                     // tells what tile portion needs to be updated.
00212                 PagingLandScapeRenderable * const r = t->getRenderable ();                
00213                     r->adjustDeformationRectangle (tileposx, tileposz); 
00214         }
00215     }
00216     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00217     const bool PagingLandScapeData2D::deformHeight(const Vector3 &deformationPoint,
00218                                                    Real &modificationHeight)
00219     { 
00220         // adjust x and z to be local to page
00221         const int x = static_cast<int> (deformationPoint.x - mShiftX);
00222         const int z = static_cast<int> (deformationPoint.z - mShiftZ);
00223         // due to Real imprecision on Reals, we have to use boundaries here
00224         // otherwise we'll hit asserts.
00225         const int size =  static_cast<int> (mSize-1);
00226         const unsigned int ux = static_cast<unsigned int> (std::max(std::min (x, size), 0));
00227         const unsigned int uz = static_cast<unsigned int> (std::max(std::min (z, size), 0));
00228             return deformHeight(ux, uz, modificationHeight);
00229     } 
00230     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00231     const bool PagingLandScapeData2D::deformHeight(const unsigned int x,
00232                                                     const unsigned int z,
00233                                                     Real &modificationHeight)
00234     {  
00235         const unsigned int arraypos = static_cast <unsigned int> (z * mSize + x);
00236         assert (mHeightData && arraypos < mMaxArrayPos);
00237 
00238         const Real maxH = mParent->getMaxHeight();
00239         const Real newH = mHeightData[arraypos] - modificationHeight;
00240 
00241         bool did_modif = false;
00242             if (newH <= 0.0f)
00243         {
00244             if (mHeightData[arraypos] != 0.0f)
00245                 did_modif = setHeight(x, z, arraypos, 0.0f);
00246             modificationHeight = 0.0f;
00247         }
00248         else if (newH >= maxH)  
00249         {
00250             if (mHeightData[arraypos] != maxH)
00251                 did_modif = setHeight(x, z, arraypos, maxH);
00252             modificationHeight = maxH;
00253         }
00254             else 
00255         {
00256            did_modif = setHeight(x, z, arraypos, newH);
00257             modificationHeight = newH;
00258         }
00259         return did_modif;
00260 
00261     }   
00262     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00263     bool PagingLandScapeData2D::setHeight(const unsigned int x, const unsigned int z,
00264                                            const unsigned int Pos, const Real h)
00265     {
00266         if (mHeightData[Pos] != h)
00267         {
00268                 mHeightData[ Pos ] = h;    
00269 
00270                     unsigned int tileposx = x;
00271                     unsigned int tileposz = z;
00272                     // Make position local to tiles.
00273                     // and return a Tile.
00274                 PagingLandScapeTile *t = 
00275                     mParent->getSceneManager()->getPageManager()->getTilePage (tileposx, tileposz, 
00276                                                                         mPageX, mPageZ);
00277                 if (t && t->isLoaded ())
00278                 { 
00279                         // tells what tile portion needs to be updated.
00280                     PagingLandScapeRenderable * const r = t->getRenderable ();                
00281                         r->adjustDeformationRectangle (tileposx, tileposz); 
00282                         
00283                         const unsigned int tSize = mParent->getOptions()->TileSize - 1;
00284                         const unsigned int NumTiles = mParent->getOptions()->NumTiles;
00285 
00286                 const PagingLandScapeTileInfo * const info =  t->getInfo();
00287                                 const unsigned int tX = info->mTileX;
00288                 const unsigned int tZ = info->mTileZ;
00289 
00290                 // If we're on a page edge, we must duplicate the change on the 
00291                 // neighbour tile (if it has one...)
00292                 // could be a direct neighbour or a diagonal one (in a corner.)
00293                 const bool left  = (tileposx == 0     && tX != 0);
00294                 const bool right = (tileposx == tSize && tX != NumTiles - 1);
00295                 const bool down  = (tileposz == 0     && tZ != 0);
00296                 const bool up    = (tileposz == tSize && tZ != NumTiles - 1);
00297 
00298 
00299                         if (left)
00300                         { 
00301                                 PagingLandScapeRenderable * const rn = r->_getNeighbor(WEST);
00302                     if (rn)
00303                     {
00304                         if (down)
00305                         {
00306                             PagingLandScapeRenderable * const rnUp = rn->_getNeighbor(NORTH);
00307                             if (rnUp && rnUp->isLoaded ())
00308                                 { 
00309                                 rnUp->adjustDeformationRectangle (tSize, tSize); 
00310                             }
00311                         }
00312                         else  if (up)
00313                         {
00314                             PagingLandScapeRenderable * const rnDown = rn->_getNeighbor(SOUTH);
00315                             if (rnDown && rnDown->isLoaded ())
00316                                 { 
00317                                 rnDown->adjustDeformationRectangle (tSize, 0); 
00318                             }
00319                         }
00320                                     if (rn->isLoaded ())
00321                                     { 
00322                                         rn->adjustDeformationRectangle (tSize, tileposz); 
00323                                     }
00324                     }
00325                         }
00326                 else  if (right)
00327                 {
00328                     PagingLandScapeRenderable * const rn = r->_getNeighbor(EAST);
00329                     if (rn)
00330                         { 
00331                         if (down)
00332                         {
00333                             PagingLandScapeRenderable * const rnUp = rn->_getNeighbor(NORTH);
00334                             if (rnUp && rnUp->isLoaded ())
00335                                 { 
00336                                 rnUp->adjustDeformationRectangle (0, tSize); 
00337                             }
00338                         }
00339                         else  if (up)
00340                         {
00341                             PagingLandScapeRenderable * const rnDown = rn->_getNeighbor(SOUTH);
00342                             if (rnDown && rnDown->isLoaded ())
00343                                 { 
00344                                 rnDown->adjustDeformationRectangle (0, 0); 
00345                             }
00346                         }
00347                         if (rn)
00348                             { 
00349                             rn->adjustDeformationRectangle (0, tileposz); 
00350                         }
00351                     }
00352                 }
00353                 if (down)
00354                 {
00355                     PagingLandScapeRenderable * const rn = r->_getNeighbor(NORTH);
00356                     if (rn && rn->isLoaded ())
00357                         { 
00358                         rn->adjustDeformationRectangle (tileposx, tSize); 
00359                     }
00360                 }
00361                 else  if (up)
00362                 {
00363                     PagingLandScapeRenderable * const rn = r->_getNeighbor(SOUTH);
00364                     if (rn && rn->isLoaded ())
00365                         { 
00366                         rn->adjustDeformationRectangle (tileposx, 0); 
00367                     }
00368                 }
00369                 }
00370         
00371                 adjustDeformationRectangle (x, z);
00372             return true;
00373         }
00374        return false;
00375     }
00376     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00377     bool PagingLandScapeData2D::setHeight(const unsigned int x, const unsigned int z, 
00378                                                                const Real h)
00379     {       
00380         const unsigned int Pos = static_cast <unsigned int> ((z * mSize)+ x);
00381         assert  (mHeightData &&  mMaxArrayPos > Pos); 
00382         return setHeight(x, z, Pos, h);
00383     }
00384 #endif //_MAPSPLITTER
00385     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00386     const Vector3 PagingLandScapeData2D::getNormal (const Real mX, const Real mZ)
00387     {
00388         // First General method : (9 adds and 6 muls + a normalization)
00389         //        *---v3--*
00390         //        |   |   |
00391         //        |   |   |
00392         //        v1--X--v2
00393         //        |   |   |
00394         //        |   |   |
00395         //        *---v4--*
00396         //
00397         //        U = v2 - v1;
00398         //        V = v4 - v3;
00399         //        N = Cross(U, V);
00400         //        N.normalise;
00401         //
00402         // BUT IN CASE OF A HEIGHTMAP :
00403         //
00404         //   if you do some math by hand before you code,
00405         //   you can see that N is immediately given by
00406         //  Approximation (2 adds and a normalization)
00407         //
00408         //        N = Vector3(z[x-1][y] - z[x+1][y], z[x][y-1] - z[x][y+1], 2);
00409         //        N.normalise();
00410         //
00411         // or even using SOBEL operator VERY accurate!
00412         // (14 adds and a normalization)
00413         //
00414         //       N = Vector3 (z[x-1][y-1] + z[x-1][y] + z[x-1][y] + z[x-1][y+1] - z[x+1][y-1] - z[x+1][y] - z[x+1][y] - z[x+1][y+1],
00415         //                     z[x-1][y-1] + z[x][y-1] + z[x][y-1] + z[x+1][y-1] - z[x-1][y+1] - z[x][y+1] - z[x][y+1] - z[x+1][y+1],
00416         //                     8);
00417         //       N.normalize();
00418 
00419 
00420         // Fast SOBEL filter
00421 
00422         const size_t pageSize = mSize - 1;
00423 
00424         // the divider make sure we do respect proportion  (height and width proportional to y)
00425         const Real Divider = static_cast <Real> (pageSize) / mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00426 
00427         assert (mHeightData);
00428 
00429         #define  getisIn(a, b) (mHeightData[static_cast<unsigned int> (a) + static_cast<unsigned int> (b) * mSize])
00430 
00431         if (mX > 0 && mZ > 0 &&
00432              mX < pageSize && mZ < pageSize)
00433         {
00434 
00435             //                        Vector3 result (getisIn(x-1,z-1) + getisIn (x-1, z) + getisIn (x-1, z) + getisIn (x-1, z+1) - getisIn (x+1, z-1) - getisIn (x+1, z) - getisIn (x+1, z) - getisIn (x+1, z+1),
00436             //                                            8.0f,
00437             //                                        getisIn (x-1, z-1) + getisIn (x, z-1) + getisIn (x, z-1) + getisIn (x+1, z-1) - getisIn (x-1, z+1) - getisIn (x, z+1) - getisIn (x, z+1) - getisIn (x+1, z+1));
00438 
00439                 Vector3 result((getisIn (mX - 1 , mZ)     - getisIn (mX + 1 , mZ)) * Divider,
00440                                 2.0f,
00441                                 (getisIn (mX,      mZ - 1) - getisIn (mX     , mZ + 1)) * Divider);
00442 
00443                 result.normalise ();
00444 
00445                 return result;
00446         }
00447         else
00448         {   
00449             unsigned int x = static_cast <unsigned int> (mX);
00450             unsigned int z = static_cast <unsigned int> (mZ);
00451             Real a,b,c,d;
00452 
00453             if (x == 0)
00454             {                
00455                     a = getisIn (x  , z);
00456                     b = getisIn (x + 1, z);
00457             }
00458             else if (x == pageSize)
00459             {                
00460                     a = getisIn (x - 1 , z);
00461                     b = getisIn (x , z);
00462             }
00463             else
00464             {
00465                 a = getisIn (x - 1 , z);
00466                 b = getisIn (x + 1, z);
00467             }
00468 
00469             if (z == 0)
00470             {
00471                  c = getisIn (x , z);
00472                  d = getisIn (x , z + 1);
00473             }
00474             else if (z == pageSize)
00475             {
00476                  c = getisIn (x , z - 1);
00477                  d = getisIn (x , z);
00478             }
00479             else
00480             {
00481                 c = getisIn (x , z - 1);
00482                 d = getisIn (x , z + 1);
00483             }
00484 
00485 
00486             Vector3 result((a     - b) * Divider,
00487                             2.0f,
00488                             (c - d) * Divider);
00489             result.normalise ();
00490             return result;
00491 
00492 #ifdef _NOWAY
00493 #ifndef _MAPSPLITTER
00494         #define  getisOut(a, b) (PagingLandScapeData2DManager::getSingleton ().getHeightAtPage (mPageX, mPageZ, static_cast<int> (a), static_cast<int> (b)))
00495 
00496 //                       Vector3 result (getisOut(x-1,z-1) + getisOut (x-1, z) + getisOut (x-1, z) + getisOut (x-1, z+1) - getisOut (x+1, z-1) - getisOut (x+1, z) - getisOut (x+1, z) - getisOut (x+1, z+1),
00497 //                                        8.0f,
00498 //                                        getisOut (x-1, z-1) + getisOut (x, z-1) + getisOut (x, z-1) + getisOut (x+1, z-1) - getisOut (x-1, z+1) - getisOut (x, z+1) - getisOut (x, z+1) - getisOut (x+1, z+1));
00499 
00500                 Vector3 result((getisOut (mX - 1 , mZ)     - getisOut (mX + 1 , mZ)) * Divider,
00501                                 2.0f,
00502                                 (getisOut (mX,      mZ - 1) - getisOut (mX     , mZ + 1)) * Divider);
00503 
00504                 result.normalise ();
00505 
00506 
00507               return result;
00508 #endif //_MAPSPLITTER
00509 #endif //
00510 
00511         }
00512     }
